name: Riddick: The Merc Files
summary: Command the enigmatic Riddick, voiced by Vin Diesel, as he battles pursuing mercenaries across 16 levels. Utilize stealth, combat, and eyeshine in darkness. Modes include Survival, Escape, Fetch, and Takedown.
